entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @NBCNews The WH thinking is they'll look weak wearing masks? Strange to me they don't believe their own mantra calling Covid-19 "the invisible enemy"! Thousand will be at Trump rally, and I guarantee Covid-19 THE INVISIBLE will there too! We can't forget Covid-19 cases has shot up in OK!
